innocent.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Nobody would believe that I was innocent.
The court found him innocent and he was released.
innocent.translation[0].definitions[1].d: done or said without intending to harm or offend anyone
innocent.translation[0].definitions[1].e: He was startled by their angry reaction to his innocent remark.
innocent.translation[0].definitions[2].d: not having much experience of the bad things in the world, so that you are easily deceived
innocent.translation[0].definitions[2].e: I was thirteen years old and very innocent.
innocent.translation[1].definitions[0].d: someone who does not have much experience of the bad things in life
